00015 abstract class MOC_Api_Service_Annotation extends MOC_Api_Abstract {
00016 
00022     protected $alias = array();
00023 
00029     protected function bootstrap() {
00030         $ClassAnnotation = MOC_Annotation::forClass($this);
00031         foreach ($ClassAnnotation->getAllAnnotations() as $Annotation) {
00032             // We are only interested in annotation aliases
00033             if (get_class($Annotation) !== 'MOC_Api_Annotation_Alias') {
00034                 continue;
00035             }
00036 
00037             $alias = $Annotation->alias;
00038             $method = $Annotation->method;
00039 
00040             $this->alias[$method] = $alias;
00041         }
00042     }
00043 
00052     public function provides($method) {
00053         try {
00054             $MethodAnnotation = MOC_Annotation::forClassMethod($this, $this->getMethodName($method));
00055             return $MethodAnnotation->hasAnnotation('MOC_Api_Annotation_Api');
00056         }
00057         catch (ReflectionException $E) {
00058             return false;
00059         }
00060     }
00061 
00070     protected function getMethodName($name, $prefix = 'execute') {
00071         if (array_key_exists($name, $this->alias)) {
00072             $name = $this->alias[$name];
00073         }
00074         return parent::getMethodName($name, $prefix);
00075     }
00076 }
